website_summaries.verdict: Its quite an investment, but it works extremely well at strengthening signals in areas with poor reception. Well worth the money for the coverage.
pros: Great for rural locations where cell signals are weaker
Improves signal strength in an area of 7,500 square feet
cons: Location of antenna is vital for performance of the unit

customer_reviews.title: Did not work and not fully refunded
customer_reviews.text: I called in advance to talk about the product and was assured it would work. The agent absolutely said if it did not work, I would get a full refund. The product did not work at all and then I was not fully refunded due to a restocking fee. I would absolutely not recommend or purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy531

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Lies. The 7000sqft of coverage is total BS. We had it installed earlier today and the boost in reception and data speeds is great when you’re within a few feet of the booster. Outside a few feet there is no difference in signal strength or internet speed at all.
customer_reviews.author: PGE

customer_reviews.title: Before I only had 1 Bar of 3G  inside,  after we boost 2 to 3 bars of LTE
customer_reviews.text: Chris and Matt with OnTech arrived on time, were very professional and did an excellent job installing the system. Would recommend anyone getting system installed that doesn't want to climb on their roof, to use OnTech for the installation. I went from having one bar of 3g service, having calls drop, to having 2 to 3 bars of LTE Service and able to stream videos.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: It works! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: First review ever but I just wanted to say that this works!! My house went from not having signal at all on first floor nor second floor - just a weak signal on the roof to full LTE bars close to antenna and one bar on the rest of the house. Keeping in mind my previous situation this makes me very happy but it does NOT cover 7000 sq ft for sure. Thinking about getting a second order for first floor that way it would cover the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Mallely K.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This has boosted our cell signal from 1 or less bars inside our home to 3 (with Verizion). We can now actually make and receive calls! The OnTech installation guys (actually from Dish TV) were awesome! They were friendly and conscientious - as this was installed during our COVID-19 stay at home restrictions. They asked for input on location of the devices and answered all of my questions. Overall I had a very pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked.  Problem solved!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding service. I live in an area with 0 bars or 1 bar, depending on the day. I need phone and data for my job and the only option is wireless out here. I spent about an hour total talking to tech support before I purchased. I ordered the home install product and received the next day. I scheduled the installation, and the technician arrived the next morning. I have 40Mbs to 50Mbs on my speed test and no more dropped / missed calls. I have 4 bars in the house. Outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: This product works great, go ahead and do it.
customer_reviews.text: WOW we are so happy with this product. Can actually use our phones inthe house, se d a picture via text, a d watch a movie without the wheel of death spinning to rebuffer. Received it Monday called the number a d it was professionally installed on Wednesday by a Dish technician. Took almost 5 hours , but he spent almost an hour trying to get us the best signal. Wish we had done this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Know your terrain
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing as long as there are cell towers relatively close by. Our closest cell towers in rural Vermont are located behind ledge/ridgelines so for us it was a no go. The delivery was quick and installation was quick and efficient by OnTech. My only complaint is the installation tech took the box and materials away so my return has been complicated and my $1200.00 refund is taking forever. It is in process though. We’ll see. 🙏🏻🙏🏻
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every $
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it Saturday, arrived Sunday, and professionally installed Monday. Our cellular service is now excellent throughout our home and even in our barn/workshop/gym. OnTech installation was excellent. Well worth every $.
customer_reviews.author: The Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Cell boost
customer_reviews.text: At my rural cabin in West Virginia, the cell signal is terrible. Almost impossible to make clear calls without drops. I reluctantly sprang for the best installed home we boost system. I am not handy nor technical, therefor I wanted professional help. To my surprise, 3 techs cam to my home and stayed several hours until I had a great working cell signal. Wow, what a difference. Bars doubled immediately. Why didn't I do this year ago?
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lynn Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Works but range is very very limited
customer_reviews.text: This product will boost your signal for about 10FT in one room. If you are in that 10FT then it works well if you step outside of it then its over. I expected that the effective range would be limited but I never expected it to be that limited. I don’t know why the company isn’t more upfront about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher F.

customer_reviews.title: this product didnt work for me at all
customer_reviews.text: highly disatisfied. might be the installation that came with the product but my service did not get better at all
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We were only getting one bar for voice service before install. Now we get 4 bars and no more dropped calls. Expensive but worth it for us!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mintel

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The WeBoost did not increase our signal as much as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well in a metal building.
customer_reviews.text: WeBoost did not work well with my tin roof. Very disappointed and out of too much $$$ for it not to have worked. Had to revert to adding a land line.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy A Bryant

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver don’t look for cheap options it’s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Cell phone coverage is much better, no more dropped calls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Had a real probelm with cell phone connectivety at me northern Wisconsin cabin. WeBoost took me from a single bar to 3/4 consistently. Insdtallation went smoothly and the techician was great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbieman

customer_reviews.title: 0 steps forward, 5 steps back
customer_reviews.text: A (very expensive) joke. It doesn't do what it promises to do, and the company is really difficult to deal with. I only get better cell service (albeit unreliable service) when I am hovering directly over the device. You are better off using a landline for calls. Moreover, getting the company to uninstall the device and honor a return has been a headache. The installation involves unsafe and unsightly wires - and it's been a huge pain figuring out how to get them down. I just threw $1200 out the window on a product that doesn't work, I cannot return, and will require hiring a third party specialist to uninstall.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brazil

customer_reviews.title: No more dropped calls
customer_reviews.text: First I would like to say that the installer was amazing. Setting up the install was quick and easy. I went from constantly dropping calls in the house, and having to stand in my driveway to get a signal, (not fun when it is raining) to 2 sometimes 3 bars and a solid LTE network.
customer_reviews.author: sandra arthur

customer_reviews.title: Installation included
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a small apt unit, improved cell service for all tenants
customer_reviews.author: J. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I went from spotty 1-bar Verizon service to reliable 2-3 bar Verizon 4G. The surrounding area has pretty good Verizon service, however, inside our house was terrible - particularly in the basement. Our home is a 2-story, and I had the installer mount the antenna in the basement - I now have good service throughout the house. Scheduling the installation was super quick and painless. They were here within a few days of calling, and had the system installed in a few hours. Couldn’t have been easier. If you need better cellular signal and are not handy with this type of thing, this is the solution!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This made such a difference to our phone signals. We live in an area with a lot of dead spots and now our phones have service in every part of the house. It was easy to install and set up and is fairly unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Nosnivel

customer_reviews.title: Can give reliable internet service.
customer_reviews.text: I have a house in a rural area where I could get one bar for of service out on the front porch. I bought a cell router and have the antenna sitting a foot away from the router. I get 4 bars on the router with reliable internet and 3 bars on cell phones in the same room. I think that the company overstates the claims, but now I have reliable internet in a place where I had none. I cannot complain. That is for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S

customer_reviews.title: Product works!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Looks great. We live in rural area. Service here was 1 bar at best. Now we can make calls from anywhere. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: k h

product_meta.title: weBoost Installed | Home Complete (474445) Cell Phone Signal Booster Kit | Professional Installation Included | All U.S. Carriers - Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile, Sprint & More | FCC Approved
product_meta.description: The weBoost Installed Home Complete cell signal booster is the only residential booster to include professional installation and provides a best-in-class solution for weak or nonexistent indoor cellular coverage. Upon receipt of the product, installation can be scheduled as soon as the next day, anywhere in the United States. Once installed, you and your family will experience faster data speeds, fewer dropped calls, better voice quality, superior streaming capability, and more. The weBoost Installed | Home Complete is designed to amplify cell signal from bands 4, 5, 12/17, 13 and 25/2. It works on every network and with all major U.S. carriers, including AT&T, Verizon, Sprint, T-Mobile, US Cellular, and Straight Talk. Backed by a 2-year manufacturer's warranty along with a 30-day money-back guarantee, the weBoost Installed is your complete solution for fixing bad cell signal coverage for good.
feature_bullets: INSTALLATION INCLUDED (RESIDENTIAL-USE ONLY, NOT FOR BUSINESSES)— The weBoost Installed | Home Complete is the only residential cell signal solution to include professional installation anywhere in U.S, in all 50 states

OUR MOST POWERFUL BOOSTER — The weBoost Installed easily reaches cell phone towers from the farthest distances and is ideal for any home with weak cell signal and limited cell coverage. For residential-use only, not for commercial use

MAXIMUM COVERAGE — The weBoost Installed boosts all available network speeds to provide reliable cellular connectivity indoors for multiple users and devices; resulting in fewer dropped calls, better voice quality, faster data speeds, and more
AWARD WINNING — The weBoost Installed cell booster won the coveted 2020 CES Innovation Award and the Gold Edison Award for Innovation

CARRIER COMPATIBILITY — The weBoost Installed works on every network and with all U.S. carriers; including Verizon, AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile, Straight Talk, and US Cellular as well as all phones and cellular-connected devices
5G READY — weBoost products will work for the next decade and beyond to provide your home with long-lasting coverage
U.S COMPANY — All weBoost products are designed and assembled in the U.S. and come with friendly, U.S.-based customer support

FCC APPROVED — Delivering the maximum signal strength allowed of 72 dB max gain, the weboost Installed meets all FCC guidelines and won’t interrupt or harm any cell carriers' signals to and from the cell tower
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED — The weBoost Installed is backed by a 2-year manufacturer’s and a 30-day money-back by weBoost
STYLISH INSIDE ANTENNA — Stylish fabric-covered inside panel antenna is a natural fit with contemporary home décor and versatile for placement on any wall or shelf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars31 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Professional Installation, Booster, Inside Antenna, Mounting Brackets for antennas, Outside antenna, Power Supply
